X.i.5.B.5.a
.
Types of Records Available at MIB
Some Merchant Marine records may be obtained from the Marine Index Bureau, Inc. (MIB), a private agency.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart i, Chapter 5, Section B - Obtaining Merchant Marine Service Records
citation: Part X, Subpart i, Chapter 5, Section B
